title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-6.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-6.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
shall apply to all services and programs which are funded by OPWDD. (b) This Subpart contains rules for: (1)
the allowability of capital costs, pursuant to transactions with related and unrelated parties; (2)
the allowability of costs of capital
moveable and personal property obtained from related and unrelated parties, other than capital moveable equipment and personal property of an IRA or group
day habilitation program; and
(3)
the allowability of goods, services and other property obtained from related
parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
635-6.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
